Module help
Package help.utilities

Class MovieDBO

java.lang.Object
help.utilities.MovieDBO
public class MovieDBO extends Object
Data Base Object (DBO) class for managing movie-related database operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieDBO

      public MovieDBO()

  • Method Details

    • getBlobData

      private byte[] getBlobData(Blob blob) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the binary data from a BLOB (Binary Large Object) as a byte array.

      This method reads the binary data stored in a BLOB object and returns it as a byte array. If the BLOB is null, it returns null.

      Parameters:
      blob - The BLOB object from which the data will be extracted.
      Returns:
      A byte array containing the binary data of the BLOB, or null if the BLOB is null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while reading the BLOB data.

    • debugPosterImage

      public void debugPosterImage(int movieId) throws Exception
      Retrieves and prints the poster image data for a specific movie.

      This method queries the database for the poster image associated with a movie and prints the details, including the movie ID, the length of the image data, and the first few bytes of the image.

      Parameters:
      movieId - The ID of the movie whose poster image data is to be retrieved.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database access error occurs or any other exception is thrown during execution.

    • ReadSummary

      public String ReadSummary(String summaryPath)
      Reads the content of a summary file and returns it as a string.

      This method opens the file specified by the provided path, reads its contents line by line, and appends each line to a string. The entire file content is returned as a string.

      Parameters:
      summaryPath - The path to the summary file to be read.
      Returns:
      A string containing the contents of the summary file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • findAll

      public List<Movie> findAll() throws Exception
      Retrieves all movies from the database and returns them as a list of Movie objects.

      This method queries the "Movies" table in the database to fetch all movie details including the movie ID, title, poster image, genre, summary, and duration. It then creates Movie objects and adds them to a list, which is returned to the caller.

      Returns:
      A list of Movie objects representing all the movies in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while accessing the database.
